description: Step to remove records from a model, without the 200 limit and the option to filter and remove relational data.
label: Delete All Records

options.name: model
options.label: Model
options.info: The model for which you want to delete all records.

options.name: amountToDelete
options.info: When deleting huge ammount of records at once, we will limit the total ammount of records to be deleted to this number. Keep in mind this is from the parent record, this amount does not consider child relations if enabled
options.label: Limit the number of records to delete

options.name: batchSize
options.info: Deleting records in larger batches will increase performance, however if the batch size is too big it could decrease the amount deleted because it will first initiate a list to delete first.
options.label: Batch size

options.name: filter
options.label: Filter
options.info: Filter based on Data API filter with variable options.

options.name: filterVars
options.label: Filter variables
options.info: Variables to be used in the filter option.
